message.name: TCP Transmission Request
message.description: Request data to be sent over a TCP connection

field.name: Destination
field.description: Recipient identifier (number or name).

field.name: Timeout
field.description: Period of time to send message (in seconds).

field.name: Message Data
field.description: IMC message to be transmitted .

message.name: TCP Transmission Status
message.description: Reply sent in response to a TCP sending request.

field.name: Information
field.description: Error description.

message.name: Asset Report
message.description: This message is represents an Asset position / status.

field.name: Asset Name
field.description: The human readable name of the asset.

field.name: Report Timestamp
field.description: Time in seconds since epoch, for the generation instant.

message.name: Abort
message.description: Stops any executing actions and put the system in a standby mode.

message.name: Plan Specification
message.description:
Identity and description of a plan's general parameters, associated with plan loading (i.e. load plan command in *PlanCommand*).
A plan specification is defined by a plan identifier, a set of maneuver specifications and a start maneuver from that set.
See the :ref:`PlanManeuver` message for details on maneuver specification.

field.name: Plan ID
field.description: The plan's identifier.

field.name: Plan Description
field.description: Verbose text description of plan.

field.name: Namespace
field.description: Namespace for plan variables.

field.name: Plan Variables
field.description: Plan variables.

field.name: Starting maneuver
field.description: Indicates the id of the starting maneuver for this plan.

field.name: Maneuvers
field.description: List of maneuver specifications.

field.name: Transitions
field.description: List of maneuver specifications.

field.name: Start Actions
field.description: Contains an optionally defined 'MessageList' for actions fired on plan activation.

field.name: End Actions
field.description: Contains an optionally defined 'MessageList' for actions fired on plan termination.

message.name: Plan Maneuver
message.description: Named plan maneuver.

field.name: Maneuver ID
field.description: The maneuver ID.

field.name: Maneuver Specification
field.description: The maneuver specification.

field.name: Start Actions
field.description: Contains an optionally defined 'MessageList' for actions fired on plan activation.

field.name: End Actions
field.description: Contains an optionally defined 'MessageList' for actions fired on plan termination.

message.name: Plan Transition
message.description: Describes a plan transition within a plan specification. A transition states the vehicle conditions that must be met to signal the transition, the maneuver that should be started as a result, and an optional set of actions triggered by the transition.

field.name: Source
field.description: Comma separated list of maneuver IDs, or the special value '.' to identify a global plan transition.

field.name: Destination Maneuver Name
field.description: Target maneuver name. If it equals the special value '_done_' then plan should terminate with a success status. If it equals the special value '_error_' then the plan should terminate with an error status.

field.name: Transition conditions
field.description: Comma separated list of conditions for transition. Each condition identifier corresponds to a known predicate which is interpreted and tested internally by the vehicle.

field.name: Transition actions
field.description: Messages processed when the transition is triggered.

message.name: Plan DB
message.description: Request/reply to plan database.

field.name: Type
field.description: Indicates if the message is a request, or a reply to a previous request.

field.name: Operation
field.description:
Indicates the operation affecting the DB.
The operation may relate to a single plan or the entire plan DB. For each request, a plan DB may reply with any number of 'in progress' replies followed by a success or a failure reply.
The 'op', 'request_id' and 'plan_id' fields of a request will be echoed in one or more responses to that request. The operation at stake also determines a certain type of the 'arg' field, and whether or not the 'plan_id' field needs to be set.

value.name: Set Plan
value.description: Set a plan in the DB. The 'plan_id' field identifies the plan, and a pre-existing plan with the same identifier, if any will be overwritten. For requests, the 'arg' field must contain a 'PlanSpecification' message.

value.name: Delete Plan
value.description: Delete a plan from the DB. The 'plan_id' field identifies the plan to delete.

value.name: Get Plan
value.description: Get a plan stored in the DB.The 'plan_id' field identifies the plan. Successful replies will yield a 'PlanSpecification' message in the 'arg' field.

value.name: Get Plan Info
value.description: Get DB state for a stored plan. The 'plan_id' field identifies the plan. Successful replies will yield a 'PlanDBInformation' message in the 'arg' field.

value.name: Clear Database
value.description: Clear the entire DB.

value.name: Get Database State (Simple)
value.description: Get state of the entire DB. Successful replies will yield a 'PlanDBState' message in the 'arg' field but without individual plan information (in the 'plans_info' field of 'PlanDBState').

value.name: Get Database State (Detailed)
value.description: Get detailed state of the entire DB. Successful replies will yield a 'PlanDBState' message in the 'arg' field with individual plan information (in the 'plans_info' field of 'PlanDBState').

value.name: Boot Notification
value.description: PlanDB replies of this type are sent automatically during bootstrap.

field.name: Request ID
field.description: Request ID. This may be used by interfacing modules, e.g. using sequence counters, to annotate requests and appropriately identify replies

field.name: Plan ID
field.description: Plan identifier for the operation, if one is required.

field.name: Argument
field.description: Request or reply argument.

field.name: Complementary Information
field.description: Human-readable complementary information. For example this may be used to detail reasons for failure, or to report in-progress information.

message.name: Plan DB State
message.description: Characterizes the state of the entire plan database.

field.name: Plan -- Count
field.description: Number of stored plans.

field.name: Plan -- Size of all plans
field.description: Size of all plans.The value equals the sum of the IMC payload sizes for 'PlanSpecification' stored in the DB.

field.name: Last Change -- Time
field.description: Time of last change (Epoch time).

field.name: Last Change -- Source Address
field.description: IMC address for source of last DB change.

field.name: Last Change -- Source Name
field.description: IMC node name for source of last DB change.

field.name: MD5
field.description: MD5 database verification code. The MD5 hash sum is computed over the stream formed by the MD5 of all plans, ordered by plan id, in compliance with RFC 1321.

field.name: Plan info
field.description: Individual information for plans.

field.name: Plan ID
field.description: Plan identifier.

field.name: Plan Size
field.description: Plan size. The value equals the IMC message payload of the associated 'PlanSpecification' message in bytes.

field.name: Last Changed -- Time
field.description: Time of last change to the plan (Epoch time).

field.name: Last Change -- Source Address
field.description: IMC address for source of last change to the plan.

field.name: Last Change -- Source Name
field.description: IMC node name for source of last change to the plan.

field.name: MD5
field.description: MD5 plan verification code. The value is calculated over the message payload of the 'PlanSpecification', in compliance with RFC 1321.

message.name: Plan Control
message.description: Plan control request/reply.

field.name: Type
field.description: Indicates if the message is a request or a reply to a previous request. The *op*, *request_id* and *plan_id* fields of a request will be echoed in one or more responses to that request.

field.name: Operation
field.description: Plan control operation.

value.name: Start Plan
value.description:
Start plan identified by *plan_id* field. The command will try to load the corresponding plan if none is loaded, and in that case will follow the same discipline as the *LOAD* command.
If the message in *arg* is a :ref:`Maneuver`, a single-maneuver plan will be generated and executed.
This will override any current plan being executed.

value.name: Stop Plan
value.description: Stop current plan being executed if any.

value.name: Load Plan
value.description: Load Plan. If a :ref:`PlanSpecification` is given with the request in the *data* field, then that plan is used and stored in the Plan DB. Otherwise, the plan is loaded from the Plan DB.

value.name: Get Plan
value.description: Get loaded plan. For a successful reply, the *data* field will contain the :ref:`PlanSpecification` message that corresponds to the currently loaded plan.

field.name: Request ID
field.description: Request ID. This may be used by interfacing modules e.g. using sequence counters. to annotate requests and appropriately identify replies.

field.name: Plan Identifier
field.description: The identifier for the plan to be stopped / started / loaded / retrieved according to the command requested (*op* field).

value.name: Calibrate Vehicle
value.description: Perform vehicle calibration.

value.name: Ignore Errors
value.description: Execute current plan while ignoring some errors that might be active.

field.name: Request/Reply Argument
field.description: Complementary message argument for requests/replies.

field.name: Complementary Info
field.description: Complementary human-readable information. This is used in association to replies.

message.name: Plan Control State
message.description: State of plan control.

field.name: State
field.description: Describes overall state.

value.name: Blocked
value.description: Plan execution is blocked e.g., due to a vehicle error, or if no plan is loaded.

value.name: Ready
value.description: Ready to start plan execution.

value.name: Initializing
value.description: Initializing plan for execution.

value.name: Executing
value.description: Executing plan.

field.name: Plan -- ID
field.description: Identifier of plan currently loaded.

field.name: Plan -- ETA
field.description: Current plan estimated time to completion. The value will be -1 if the time is unknown or undefined.

field.name: Plan -- Progress
field.description: Current plan estimated progress in percent. The value will be negative if unknown or undefined.

field.name: Maneuver -- ID
field.description: Current node ID, when executing a plan.

field.name: Maneuver -- Type
field.description: Type of maneuver being executed (IMC serialization id), when executing a plan.

field.name: Maneuver -- ETA
field.description: Current node estimated time to completion, when executing a plan. The value will be -1 if the time is unknown or undefined.

field.name: Last Plan Outcome
field.description: Outcome of the last executed plan.

value.name: None
value.description: Unknown or not filled.

value.name: Success
value.description: Last plan execution was successful.

value.name: Failure
value.description: Last plan execution was a failure.

message.name: Plan Variable
message.description: A plan variable.

message.name: Plan Generation
message.description: This message is used to order the generation of plans based on id and set of parameters.

value.name: Generate
value.description: Generate the plan and store it in the PlanDB.

value.name: Execute
value.description: Generate (storing it in the PlanDB) and execute it immediately.

value.name: Request
value.description: Request the execution of this command.

value.name: Error
value.description: Some error has occurred while executing the command. The error can be found in the 'params' tuplelist (under the key 'error').

value.name: Success
value.description: The requested command was executed successfully.

field.name: Plan Identifier
field.description: The name of the plan to be generated.

field.name: Parameters
field.description: An optional list of parameters to be used by the plan generation module.

message.name: Leader State
message.description:
This message defines the formation leader state.
LeaderState is a complete description of the leader state in terms of parameters such as position, orientation and velocities at a particular moment in time.
The system position is given by a North-East-Down (NED) local tangent plane displacement (x, y, z) relative to an absolute WGS-84 coordinate (latitude, longitude, height above ellipsoid).
The symbols for position and attitude as well as linear and angular velocities were chosen according to SNAME's notation (1950). The body-fixed reference frame and Euler angles are depicted next:
.. figure:: ../images/euler-lauv.png
:align: center
Euler angles

field.name: Group Name
field.description: Name for the formation group.

field.name: Action on the leader state
field.description: Action on the formation leader state variables

field.name: Latitude (WGS-84)
field.description: WGS-84 Latitude.

field.name: Longitude (WGS-84)
field.description: WGS-84 Longitude.

field.name: Height (WGS-84)
field.description: Height above the WGS-84 ellipsoid.

field.name: Offset north
field.description: The North offset of the North/East/Down field with respect to LLH.

field.name: Offset east
field.description: The East offset of the North/East/Down field with respect to LLH.

field.name: Offset down
field.description: The Down offset of the North/East/Down field with respect to LLH.

field.name: Rotation over x axis
field.description: The phi Euler angle from the vehicle's attitude.

field.name: Rotation over y axis
field.description: The theta Euler angle from the vehicle's attitude.

field.name: Rotation over z axis
field.description: The psi Euler angle from the vehicle's attitude.

field.name: Ground Velocity X (North)
field.description: Ground Velocity xx axis velocity component.

field.name: Ground Velocity Y (East)
field.description: Ground Velocity yy axis velocity component.

field.name: Ground Velocity Z (Down)
field.description: Ground Velocity zz axis velocity component.

field.name: Angular Velocity in x

field.name: Angular Velocity in y
field.description: The angular velocity over body-fixed yy axis (pitch).

field.name: Angular Velocity in z
field.description: The angular velocity over body-fixed zz axis (yaw).

field.name: Stream Velocity X (North)
field.description: Stream Velocity xx axis velocity component.

field.name: Stream Velocity Y (East)
field.description: Stream Velocity yy axis velocity component.

field.name: Stream Velocity Z (Down)
field.description: Stream Velocity zz axis velocity component.

field.name: Plan Identifier
field.description: The name of the plan to be generated.

field.description: Type of plan statistics, if they are launched before, during or after the plan execution.

value.name: Basic Plan
value.description: Basic plan, meaning it is Linear, Finite and Noncyclic.

value.name: Nonlinear
value.description: Plan is nonlinear.

value.name: Infinite
value.description: Plan is infinite in duration.

value.name: Cyclical
value.description: Plan is cyclical.

value.name: All
value.description: All properties checked.

field.name: Durations
field.description: Maneuver and plan duration statistics in seconds, for example: Total=1000,Goto1=20,Rows=980

field.name: Distances

field.name: Actions

field.name: Fuel

message.name: Reported State
message.description: A vehicle state that is reported to other consoles (including PDAConsole). Source can be acoustic tracker, SMS, Wi-Fi, etc...

field.name: Depth
field.description: The reported depth. In the case of not knowing the depth 0 will be reported. Airplanes usually have negative values (por positive altitude).

field.name: Roll
field.description: The phi Euler angle from the vehicle's attitude.

field.name: Pitch
field.description: The theta Euler angle from the vehicle's attitude.

field.name: Yaw
field.description: The psi Euler angle from the vehicle's attitude.

field.name: Reception Time
field.note: Correct interpretation of this field may require synchronization of clocks between sender and recipient
field.description: The time when the packet was sent, as seen by the packet dispatcher. The number of seconds is represented in Universal Coordinated Time (UCT) in seconds since Jan 1, 1970 using IEEE double precision floating point numbers.

field.name: System Identifier
field.description: The id of the system whose position is being reported (it can be a vehicle's id, a boat name, etc)

field.name: Source Type
field.description: How the position was received/calculated

message.name: Remote Sensor Info
message.description: Whenever the CUCS receives a message from one of the existing sensors (through SMS, ZigBee, Acoustic Comms, ...) it disseminates that info recurring to this message.

field.name: Id
field.description: An unique string that identifies the sensor. Used mostly for logging/presentation.

field.name: Class
field.description: The class of a sensor tells the type of sensor originating this message. It will determine how the sensor is to be shown and (optionally) how the custom data (tuplelist) is to be interpreted.

message.name: Maneuver Done
message.description: Notification of completion of a maneuver (optional use).

message.name: Station Keeping Extended
message.description: The Station Keeping Extended maneuver makes the vehicle come to the surface and then enter a given circular perimeter around a waypoint coordinate for a certain amount of time. It extends the Station Keeping maneuver with the feature 'Keep Safe', which allows for the vehicle to hold position underwater and popup periodically to communicate.

field.name: Latitude WGS-84
field.description: WGS-84 Latitude.

field.name: Longitude WGS-84
field.description: WGS-84 Longitude.

field.name: Z Reference
field.description: Maneuver reference in the z axis. Use z_units to specify whether z represents depth, altitude or other.

field.name: Z Units
field.description: Units of the z reference.

field.name: Radius
field.description: Radius.

field.name: Duration
field.description: Duration (0 for unlimited).

field.name: Speed
field.description: The value of the desired speed, in the scale specified by the "Speed Units" field.

field.name: Speed Units
field.description: Indicates the units used for the speed value.

field.name: PopUp Period
field.description: The period at which the vehicle will popup to report its position. Only used if flag KEEP_SAFE is on.

field.name: PopUp Duration
field.description: The duration of the station keeping at surface level when it pops up. Only used if flag KEEP_SAFE is on.

field.name: Flags
field.description: Flags of the maneuver.

value.name: Keep safe behaviour
value.description: If this flag is set, the vehicle will hold position underwater, loitering at z reference. It will popup periodically to report position. When it pops up, it will stay at surface in "normal" station keeping behaviour for a certain time (popup_duration).

field.description: Custom settings for maneuver.

message.name: Create Session
message.description:
Request creating a new session with this remote peer. Example session sequence is shown in the following diagram.
.. figure:: ../images/session_sequence.png
:align: center

field.name: Session Timeout
field.description: Session timeout, in seconds. If no messages are received from the remote peer, the session will be closed after this ammount of seconds have ellapsed.

message.name: Close Session
message.description: Request closing of an ongoing session

field.name: Messages to subscribe
field.description: Comma-separated list of messages to subscribe. Example: "EstimatedState,EulerAngles,Temperature"

message.name: Session Keep-Alive
message.description: Message exchanged to prevent a session from timing out

message.name: Session Status
message.description: Message transmitted periodically to inform the state of a communication session

message.name: I/O Event
message.description: Notification of an I/O event.

field.name: Type
field.description: Event type.

field.name: Error Message
field.description: Human-readable error message.

message.name: UamTxFrame
message.description: This message shall be sent to acoustic modem drivers to request transmission of a data frame via the acoustic channel.

field.name: Sequence Id
field.description: A sequence identifier that should be incremented for each request. This number will then be used to issue transmission status updates via the message UamTxStatus.

field.name: Destination System
field.description: The canonical name of the destination system. If supported, the special destination 'broadcast' shall be used to dispatch messages to all nodes.

field.name: Flags
field.description: Transmission flags.

value.name: Acknowledgement
value.description: On modems that support it, this flag shall be used to request an acknowledgment of reception from the receiving node.

value.name: Delayed
value.description: On modems that support it, this flag shall be used to delay the frame transmission until the modem needs to transmit control data (e.g., acknowledgment of reception, etc).

value.name: Forced
value.description: Ignore safety checks such as "transducer not connected".

field.name: Data
field.description: The actual data frame to transmit. The data size shall not exceed the MTU of the acoustic modem.

message.name: UamRxFrame
message.description: This message shall be dispatched by acoustic modem drivers each time a data frame is received over the acoustic channel.

field.name: Source System
field.description: The canonical name of the node that transmitted the data frame. If this name cannot be resolved the string 'unknown' shall be used.

field.name: Destination System
field.description: The canonical name of the destination node of the data frame. If this name cannot be resolved the string 'unknown' shall be used.

field.name: Flags
field.description: Reception flags.

value.name: Promiscuous
value.description: The data frame was transmitted to an acoustic modem other than the one the acoustic modem driver is controlling.

value.name: Delayed
value.description: The data frame was transmitted using the DELAYED flag.

field.name: Data
field.description: The actual received data frame.

message.name: UamTxStatus
message.description: This message shall be used by acoustic modem drivers to send updates on the transmission status of data frames.

field.name: Sequence Id
field.description: The sequence identifier of the frame transmission request.

field.name: Value
field.description: Frame transmission status.

value.name: Transmission Completed
value.description: The frame transmission was completed.

value.name: Transmission Failed
value.description: The frame transmission failed. The reason for the failure is given in the field 'error'.

value.name: Transmission Canceled
value.description: The frame transmission was canceled.

value.name: Modem is busy
value.description: The acoustic modem driver is busy and could not honor the frame transmission request at the moment.

value.name: Invalid address
value.description: The canonical name of the destination node could not be resolved.

value.name: In Progress
value.description: The frame transmission is in progress.

value.name: Unsupported operation
value.description: The frame transmission request is not valid for this acoustic modem driver.

value.name: Invalid transmission size
value.description: The frame transmission request exceeds the MTU of the acoustic modem.

value.name: Message has been sent
value.description: The message has been sent out.

value.name: Message has been acknowledged by the destination
value.description: Message has been acknowledged by the destination.

value.name: No transducer
value.description: Transducer not connected to the acoustic modem.

field.name: Error Message
field.description: Where applicable this field shall contain a human-readable message explaining the error.

message.name: UamRxRange
message.description: Acoustic range measurement.

field.name: Sequence Id
field.description: The sequence identifier of the ranging request.

field.name: System
field.description: The canonical name of the ranged system.

field.name: Value
field.description: The actual range. Negative values denote invalid measurements.

message.name: UamTxRange
message.description: Request an acoustic modem driver to measure the distance to another system.

field.name: Sequence Id
field.description: A sequence identifier that should be incremented for each request. This number will then be used to issue transmission status updates via the message UamTxStatus.

field.name: Destination System
field.description: The canonical name of the target system.

field.name: Timeout
field.description: Maximum amount of time to wait for a reply.

message.name: Formation Control Parameters
message.description: Formation controller paramenters, as: trajectory gains, control boundary layer thickness, and formation shape gains.

field.name: Action
field.description: Action on the vehicle formation control parameters.

field.name: Longitudinal Gain
field.description: Trajectory gain over the vehicle longitudinal direction.

field.name: Lateral Gain
field.description: Trajectory gain over the vehicle lateral direction.

field.name: Boundary Layer Thickness
field.description: Control sliding surface boundary layer thickness.

field.name: Leader Gain
field.description: Formation shape gain (absolute vehicle position tracking). Leader control importance gain (relative to the sum of every other formation vehicle).

field.name: Deconfliction Gain
field.description: Collision avoidance and formation shape gain (position tracking relative to the other formation vehicles). Individual vehicle importance gain (relative to the leader), when the relative position or the velocity state indicate higher probability of collision.

message.name: Formation Evaluation Data
message.description: Formation control performance evaluation variables.

field.name: Mean position error
field.description: Mean position error relative to the formation reference.

field.name: Absolute minimum distance
field.description: Overall minimum distance to any other vehicle in the formation.

field.name: Mean minimum distance
field.description: Mean minimum distance to any other vehicle in the formation.

message.name: Formation Control Parameters
message.description: Formation controller paramenters, as: trajectory gains, control boundary layer thickness, and formation shape gains.

field.name: Longitudinal Gain
field.description: Trajectory gain over the vehicle longitudinal direction.

field.name: Lateral Gain

field.name: Acceleration Switch Gain
field.description: Switch gain to compensate the worst case of the wind flow acceleration.

field.name: Safety Distance
field.description: Inter-vehicle safety distance.

field.name: Deconfliction Offset
field.description: Distance offset which defines the buffer area beyond the safety distace.

field.name: Acceleration Safety Margin

field.name: Maximum Longitudinal Acceleration

value.name: Stop

value.name: Ready
value.description: Stop the formation maneuver.

value.name: Executing
value.description: Stop the formation maneuver.

value.name: Failure

field.name: Evaluation Time

field.name: Formation Control Parameters

message.description: This message holds a geographical that, according to the number of vertices, may correspond to a point, a line or polygon.

field.description: The unique identifier for this feature.

field.description: The vertices of the feature. If the feature has just one vertex, it is a point. If the feature has exactly two vertices, it is a line. Features with more than two points, correspond to polygons.

message.description: This message is used to report the coverage state of a geographical feature. It is reported by the UxVs performing the surveys.

field.name: Identifier
field.description: The unique feature identifier. Feature IDs are managed by the C2.

value.name: Completed
value.description: The coverage is completed for this feature.

value.name: Partial
value.description: The feature is partially complete.

value.name: None
value.description: The coverage has not been started for this feature.

value.name: Reject
value.description: Reject the execution of this task.

value.name: Assign
value.description: Request this task to be assigned to the destination of the message.

value.name: Unassign
value.description: Request this task to be unassigned from the destination of the message.

value.name: Status
value.description: Report the state of execution of this task.

value.name: Status Request

field.description: The identifier of the feature to be surveyed.

field.name: Deadline
field.description: The deadline until when the task must be finished. The number of seconds is represented in Universal Coordinated Time (UCT) in seconds since Jan 1, 1970 using IEEE double precision floating point numbers.

message.name: Move Task
message.description: This message is used to describe an area surveying task.

field.name: Task Identifier
field.description: The identifier for this task.

field.name: Destination
field.description: The destination where to go.

field.name: Deadline
field.description: The deadline until when the task must be finished. The number of seconds is represented in Universal Coordinated Time (UCT) in seconds since Jan 1, 1970 using IEEE double precision floating point numbers.

field.name: Task Identifier
field.description: The identifier for this task.

message.name: Synchronization Task
message.description: This message is used to describe an area synchronization task.

field.name: Task Identifier
field.description: The identifier for this task.

field.name: Geo Feature Identifier
field.description: The identifier of the feature where vehicles synchronize.

field.name: Synchronization Time Window
field.description: Time window for synchronization task execution, in seconds.

field.name: Deadline
field.description: The deadline until when the task must be finished. The number of seconds is represented in Universal Coordinated Time (UCT) in seconds since Jan 1, 1970 using IEEE double precision floating point numbers.
